Title: McCabe & Mrs. Miller
Writer: Edmund Naughton (novel), Robert Altman (screenplay), Brian McKay (screenplay)
Actors: Warren Beatty, Julie Christie, Rene Auberjonois, William Devane
Plot: A gambler and a prostitute become business partners in a remote Old West mining town, and their enterprise thrives until a large corporation arrives on the scene.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 3 nominations.
